answers.answer: With my first pregnancy I was induced due to her being over due and caught preeclampsia. But, I do remember her being very active until I fully dilated.

Last night my baby was the same way. Constant movements for hours. I taught something was wrong but people commented sayin be worried for decreased movements instead of increased. I'm 39+5. Hope this helps.

That Was What I Was Thinking Since They Always Want To Know If Im Still Feeling Movement. I Go Back In Tomorrow (If He Doesn't Come Today) I Will Ask About It Then. I Also Think I Have To Do A Stress Test So That Should Give ME Some Answers.
I am 39+3 and was almost in tears last night because my little guy was moving so much.  I haven't dialated, had frequent contractions or anything.  I'm trying to be patient.

question: Im 40 Weeks And He Has Been All Sorts Of Active. Everything I Read Says He Should Slow Down Before Labor  AndBeing Really Active Could Be Signs For Concern. Anyone Have Any Thoughts On This?PS My Vagina Is BeyonD Sore
title: movement
